comments.text:
Please make it possible to have vertical view option in multiweek and month view also! I just can't stand that horisontal "row" way of looking at the days. Much better overview up/down imho. That is; when comparing weeks the horisontal view is good but to get a overview of the "time line" the vertical is better.

It can't be to much programming since it's already there in day and week view..?

Regards,

M.
